text: The FINA Water Polo Challengers' Cup is an international water polo tournament, organized by FINA. Intended for developing national water polo teams, the biennial tournament was first organized as the FINA World Water Polo Development Trophy in 2007. The tournament is known as the FINA Water Polo Challengers' Cup since the 2019 edition. ==Summary== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; width: 98%; text-align: center;" |- bgcolor=#C1D8FF
